title: Halo 3-Legendary Video Guide
description:
Hey! This is a torrent of some guy from www.nextgenwalkthroughs.com playing Halo 3 on Legendary mode. He gives a lot of commentary and also a bunch of helpful tips. If you just do what he does u will beat the game in no time! If you want u can watch these vids on their website but this is much better quality. All credit goes to them!(plz don&#039;t sue me!)I just put everything in one place for u guys. I also included a .pdf file of a guide.

xXEqui1ibriumXx <-- my xbox live gt

SAMPLE STATISTICS:
-------------------------------------------------

 VIDEO:
	Codec: avc1
	Language: English
	Resolution: 740x480
	Frame rate: 29.97

 Audio:
	Codec: mp4a
	Language: English
	Channels: 2
	Sample rate: 48000 Hz
	Bits per sample: 16
	Bitrate: 1536 kb/s
